channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No. 2 South Carolina Gamecocks vs. No. 8 USC Trojans Highlights | FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the greatest moments and plays in this matchup between the No. 2 South Carolina Gamecocks and the No. 8 USC Trojans.

item.title: No. 2 South Carolina Beats No. 8 Southern California in 'The Real SC' Matchup
item.description: Joyce Edwards had 17 points and 10 rebounds as No. 2 South Carolina defeated the eighth-ranked Trojans.

item.title: 'Very, Very Dangerous:' USA Win Over Paraguay Marred by Late-Game Brawl
item.description: The USMNT's win over Paraguay was marred by a late-game brawl that saw players on both benches enter the fray.

item.title: NFL Injury Report Week 11: 49ers QB Brock Purdy, WR Ricky Pearsall Returning
item.description: Week 11 of the NFL season is in full swing, and there are some key players dealing with injuries. See who's in and who's out.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From Georgia's Win Over Texas
item.description: FOX Sports' Laken Litman offers up four takeaways from Georgia's impressive SEC win over Texas.

item.title: Sources: Dobbins' IR move likely season-ending

item.title: No. 3 A&M makes history with 27-point comeback
item.description: No. 3 Texas A&M rallied from a 27-point deficit to remain undefeated with a 31-30 victory over South Carolina on Saturday.

item.title: Kiffin on Gators rumors after win: 'I love' Ole Miss

item.title: Shevchenko shuts out Zhang to retain UFC crown
